localpackagelist.packageDescription: You will be able to restrict access to a sheet through adding a group to the description of the sheet.

ruleList.comment: Grants access to sheet if app is marked as having sheet level security and you are member of the group in the sheet description
ruleList.name: SheetLevelSecurity
ruleList.rule: ((resource.objectType="sheet" and resource.published ="true" and resource.app.@SheetLevelSecurity="Yes" and user.group=resource.description) or (resource.published ="true" and resource.objectType!="sheet")) and resource.app.stream.HasPrivilege("read")

ruleList.comment: The user should see the resource if he/she has read access to the stream it is published to
ruleList.name: Stream
ruleList.rule: (resource.resourcetype = "App" and resource.stream.HasPrivilege("read")) or ((resource.resourcetype = "App.Object" and resource.published ="true" and resource.app.@SheetLevelSecurity!="Yes" and resource.objectType != "app_appscript") and resource.app.stream.HasPrivilege("read"))
